channel.title: Server Help Section Question
channel.description:
I know this is completely irrelevant to a question about server sided content, but I really believe there should be a staff member designated especially for client + server sided RS2 help sections because they are really messy. There are so many duplicate posts and spam that is isn't funny, so I was wondering if it would be possible to have someone start looking at these sections more, even though the community isn't as active as in the past.
Thanks, and once again, sorry for this irrelevant post. :cool:
